Sorcerer Smackdown

Gameplay Programmer

January 2023 - April 2023

Project Team: Open Alpha

Genre: 2d Fighting Game

Engine: Unity

Version Control: Github

Coding Language: C#

Special Skills: Wwise

Release Platform: Steam

Sorcerer Smackdown is a 2d fighting Game in which use your brains and brawns to determine who's the best wizard wrestler of all time!

As a Gameplay Programmer I was responsible for:

  • Implementing the player controller, attack collisions, and start/end round screens
  • Pair programming with new club members to teach intermediate Unity proficiency
